mapper.select: select count(*) from kjs_icbc_cardk where icbc_id>0 and bc_status=2

select ki.*,fs.name as gname,gems.name as pname from kjs_icbc_cardk ki,assess_fs fs,assess_gems gems where ki.gems_fs_id=fs.id and ki.gems_id=gems.id and ki.icbc_id=#{icbc_id} order by ki.dt_add desc limit 1
select bc_status from kjs_icbc_cardk where icbc_id=#{icbc_id} order by dt_add desc limit 1

select icbc.fk_status as fk_status, icbc.dt_edit as fk_time, kk.id as kkid, kk.bc_status as kk_status, kk.kk_kh as kk_kh, kk.pdfstep4_1 as pdfstep4_1, kk.pdf_time as pdf_time, dk.id as dkid, dk.bc_status as dk_status, mq.id as mqid, mq.bc_status as mq_status from kj_icbc icbc LEFT JOIN kjs_icbc_kk kk on kk.icbc_id=icbc.id LEFT JOIN kjs_icbc_cardk dk on dk.icbc_id=icbc.id LEFT JOIN kjs_icbc_mq mq on mq.icbc_id=icbc.id where icbc.id=#{icbc_id}
select kk.id as kkid,dk.id as dkid,mq.id as mqid from kjs_icbc_kk kk LEFT JOIN kjs_icbc_cardk dk on dk.icbc_id=kk.icbc_id LEFT JOIN kjs_icbc_mq mq on mq.icbc_id=kk.icbc_id where kk.icbc_id=#{icbc_id}
select dk.*,fs.name as gname,gems.name as pname from kjs_icbc_cardk dk LEFT JOIN assess_fs fs on dk.gems_fs_id=fs.id LEFT JOIN assess_gems gems on dk.gems_id=gems.id where dk.id=#{id}
select * from ( SELECT a.icbc_id as icbc_id,a.bc_status as bc_status,a.dt_add as dt_add FROM (SELECT * FROM kjs_icbc_cardk ORDER BY dt_add DESC) as a GROUP BY icbc_id ) as b where b.icbc_id!=0
select * from kjs_icbc_cardk where icbc_id=#{icbc_id} order by dt_add desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into kjs_icbc_cardk( id, add_time, up_time, icbc_id, result, result_time, api_add, api_edit, bc_status, gems_code, query_type, dt_fin, dt_sub, dt_edit, dt_add, mid_edit, mid_add, gems_fs_id, gems_id, imgstep4_1ss, imgstep4_2ss, imgstep4_3ss, imgstep4_4ss, imgstep4_5ss, imgstep5_1ss, imgstep6_1ss, imgstep7_1ss )values( #{id}, #{add_time}, #{up_time}, #{icbc_id}, #{result}, #{result_time}, #{api_add}, #{api_edit}, #{bc_status}, #{gems_code}, #{query_type}, #{dt_fin}, #{dt_sub}, #{dt_edit}, #{dt_add}, #{mid_edit}, #{mid_add}, #{gems_fs_id}, #{gems_id}, #{imgstep4_1ss}, #{imgstep4_2ss}, #{imgstep4_3ss}, #{imgstep4_4ss}, #{imgstep4_5ss}, #{imgstep5_1ss}, #{imgstep6_1ss}, #{imgstep7_1ss} )
